text:
e="preserve">Ramanathapuram district is one of the 37 districts in Tamil Nadu. Indian President A. P. J. Abdul Kalam was born there. It is located in south east direction of tamilnadu.It is coastal area with more palmyra trees. It is famous for its fishing and Production of palm sap, palm sugar,palm jaggery etc.It is one of the biggest districts in tamilnadu by area space.Most of the people doing agriculture as their main occupation.
Paramakudi, Kamuthi, Sayalkudi,Ramanathapuram, Uchipuli, Mandapam, Rameswaram area the main cities of Ramanathapuram district.
● Sri kothandaramar temple, Dhanushkodi road, Rameswaram
● Sri bhadrakali amman temple, Rameswaram
● Sri Nambunayaki amman temple, Rameswaram
● Sri Sethu bandhana Aanjaneyar temple, Sethukarai
● Sri Veiluganatha Vinayar temple, Uppoor
Agni theertham,Rameswaram, Arichalmunai,Dhanushkodi, Pamban bridge, Kundhukal, Villoondi theertham, Kushi beach, Thalaithoppu beach,Ramar patham etc.
